snippet: Egyptians living abroad began casting ballots on Wednesday  on an Islamist-backed draft constitution, the start of a vote that has become a test of the country’s nascent democracy.
abstract: Egyptians living abroad begin casting ballots in bitterly divisive referendum on Islamist-backed draft constitution, start of vote that has become test of country's nascent democracy.
lead_paragraph: Egyptians living abroad began casting ballots on Wednesday  on an Islamist-backed draft constitution, the start of a vote that has become a test of the country’s nascent democracy.

headline.seo: Egyptian Opposition Urges Vote Against Disputed Charter
headline.main: Rejecting Boycott, Egyptian Opposition Urges Vote Against Disputed Charter
headline.print_headline: Rejecting Boycott, Egyptian Opposition Urges Vote Against Disputed Charter
